main.title: Welcome to the Librarian's Lair
main.subtitle:
You can search for documents in this server - the whole content of the indexed files will be searched.
Results are ordered by relevance (higher = more relevant). Relevance is determined by :

search.title: Search results (ordered by relevance)
search.nbhits: There are {{total}} documents matching your query terms. The 10 more relevant matches are displayed below :

relevance.tf: Term Frequency : the more your criteria appears in a given document, the more relevant it is;
relevance.idf: Inversed Document Frequency : the fewer documents match a criteria, the more relevant they are;
relevance.fln: Field length Norm : a match in a small field (eg. title, name) is more important for relevance than a hit in a large one (eg. file content).
